plot: A secretary prone to physical numbness discovers her soul has gone after her deceased mother and she must pursue the fashion career that drove them apart in order to get it back.
title: Threads of Remorse
plot_es: A secretary prone to physical numbness discovers her soul has gone after her deceased mother and she must pursue the fashion career that drove them apart in order to get it back.
plot_en: A secretary prone to physical numbness discovers her soul has gone after her deceased mother and she must pursue the fashion career that drove them apart in order to get it back.
